data.content:
noun
plural -beats
[count] disapproving
a lazy person :a person who does not work
His friends are just a bunch of deadbeats.
chiefly US :a person who does not pay money that is owed
He was accused of being a deadbeat. - often used before another noun
a deadbeat dad [=a father who owes money to his former wife to help raise their children but does not pay it]
